channel.title: Vagrant on Jimmy Song
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant on Jimmy Song

item.title: Setting Up a Kubernetes Cluster With Vagrant and Virtualbox
item.author: jimmysong@jimmysong.io (Jimmy Song(宋净超))
item.description: Setting up a kubernetes cluster with Vagrant and Virtualbox Using vagrant file to build a kubernetes cluster which consists of 1 master(also as node) and 3 nodes. You don’t have to create complicated ca files or configuration. See in Github: kubernetes-vagrant-centos-cluster Why don’t do that with kubeadm Because I want to setup the etcd, apiserver, controller, scheduler without docker container. Architecture We will create a Kubernetes 1.9.1+ cluster with 3 nodes which contains the components below:

item.title: Vagrant介绍-从使用到放弃再到掌握完全指南
item.author: jimmysong@jimmysong.io (Jimmy Song(宋净超))
item.description: 起源 久闻Vagrant大名，之前经常看到有开源项目使用它作为分布式开发的环境配置。 因为今天在看contiv正好里面使用vagrant搭建的开
